scripts.db:up: sudo docker compose up -d postgres pgadmin
scripts.db:logs: sudo docker compose logs -f postgres pgadmin
scripts.db:migrate: sudo docker compose run --rm flyway && pnpm run db:schema && git add infra/postgres/db/schema.sql && git commit -m 'Update DB schema after migration' && git push
scripts.db:info: sudo docker compose run --rm flyway info
scripts.db:repair: sudo docker compose run --rm flyway repair
